mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservations (main_user_id, book_id, reservation_date, status) VALUES (#{mainUserId}, #{bookId}, #{reservationDate}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT reservation_id, main_user_id, book_id, status, reservation_date, expiration_date FROM reservations WHERE book_id = #{bookId} AND status IN ('等待中', '可借阅') ORDER BY CASE WHEN status = '可借阅' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, reservation_date

SELECT reservation_id, main_user_id, book_id, status, reservation_date, expiration_date FROM reservations WHERE main_user_id = #{mainUserId} AND status IN ('等待中', '可借阅') ORDER BY reservation_date DESC
SELECT reservation_id, main_user_id, book_id, status, reservation_date, expiration_date FROM reservations WHERE main_user_id = #{mainUserId} AND book_id = #{bookId} AND status = '可借阅'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservations WHERE main_user_id = #{mainUserId} AND book_id = #{bookId} AND status IN ('等待中', '可借阅')
mapper.update: UPDATE reservations SET status = '已完成' WHERE reservation_id = #{reservationId}
